_notes: Deploys a released Integration Pack component to a target environment
Called after PROMO - HTTP Op - POST ReleaseIntegrationPack for each target environment
environmentId: from the target account group
packageId: the released package ID from ReleaseIntegrationPack response
listenerStatus: optional, RUNNING (default) or PAUSED — controls listener state after deployment
componentType is NOT required — the API infers it from the packageId
